text: "Dreaming of You" is a song by Mexican-American Tejano pop singer Selena. It was released as the second single from the album of the same name (1995). ==Chart performance== Chart (1995)/(1996) Peak position U.S. Billboard Hot 100 21 U.S. Billboard Hot Singles Recurrents 9 U.S. Billboard Top 40 Mainstream 17 U.S. Billboard Hot Adult Top 40 Tracks 33 U.S. Billboard Latin Pop Airplay 9 New Zealand Album Charts 3 Australian Singles Chart 87 Canadian Singles Chart 13 UK Singles Chart 9 French SNEP Singles Chart 1 Hungary Single Charts 1 Eslovakia Single Charts 1 China Single Charts 1 Corea del sur Korea Hot 100 1 Russian Single Charts 1 Germany Singles charts 1 Greece Top 100 1 India Top 50 1 Taiwan Top 50 2 World Singles Hot 100 4 Indonesia Hot 100 1 Tokio Hot 100 4 Spanish Singles Chart 1 European Hot 100 Singles 25 Chart (2008)/(2009) Peak position Rhythm Airplay 1 Hot RingMasters 37 Chart (2010) Peak position Brasil Hot 100 7 Top 20 Latin Hits (MonitorLatino) 13 Top 20 General (MonitorLatino) 5 Top 100 (RecordReport) 2 Top Latino (RecordReport) 8 Top Anglo (RecordReport) 7 == Certifications/Sales == Sales Certifications (sales thresholds) 2,000,000 BMI Millionaires Award 123,000 France 156,000 Australia 90,000 Brasil 50,000 Canada ==References== Category:Selena songs Category:1995 songs
title: Dreaming of You (song)
